settings.title: Your wish is our command
settings.subtitle: Let us help you find the one!

settings.heading: A gesture that wont go unnoticed
settings.subheading: find the best of gifts right here!

settings.heading: Hey Girlfriend!
settings.subheading: Catch the latest jewellery scoop by subscribing to our newsletter

settings.overlay_text: Our product assortments are all unique and we offer it for limited time only, ensuring your purchase is as exclusive as your taste. We constantly add new styles to maintain freshness and to ensure your access to something exclusive every time you visit our website. We want you to celebrate every moment and turn cherished experiences into lifelong memories with our wide array of diamond jewellery collections.

settings.overlay_subtext:
Jewelili has jewelry for any & every occasion of your life.
Founded in 2017, Jewelili was launched with the sole purpose of creating affordable fine jewelry. Whether it’s a birthday, an anniversary, a wedding, or just another celebratory moment.
settings.overlay_subtext1: We pride ourselves on offering high quality products at lower values than those available at other jewellers throughout the country. What more, we also have regular flash sales to keep your retail cravings satisfied. Backed by one of the world’s largest fine jewelry manufacturers and knowing the craft well, we are able to extend extraordinary savings to all of our consumers! We are happy, when you are happy and satisfied!

settings.newsletter_subtitle: Subscribe today to get weekly updates!

Happy customer stories
settings.title: Everybody loves Jewelili
settings.text:
These pieces are beautiful, well crafted and easy to wear and style.

I decorate my ears everyday now and get stopped in the hallway so people can look at them!
settings.name: RHEA WILLIAMS

settings.subtitle: Happy customer stories
settings.title: Everybody loves Jewelili
settings.text:
The pendant definitely exceeded my expectations. It's gorgeous, not too big, and not too small.

I've been wearing it every day since I got it (approx. 2months) and it hasn't tarnished or dulled. Very happy with the purchase.
settings.name: Kie

settings.subtitle: Happy customer stories
settings.title: Everybody loves Jewelili
settings.text:
Absolutely gorgeous ring! So happy I bought it! Using as my wedding ring since I lost mine. Do not hesitate to buy from this brand.

I love their gorgeous expensive looking rings!  All the rings on my fingers are Jewelili rings.
settings.name: Krissy O
